responsibilities: Build low-code/no-code GenAI Platform tools using ServiceNow Platform capabilities and frameworks
Build high-quality, clean, scalable, and reusable code by enforcing best practices around software engineering architecture and processes (Code Reviews, Unit testing, etc.)
Balance business objectives, user experience, and long-term technical scalability to make effective trade-offs
Work with product owners to understand detailed requirements and own your code from design, implementation, test automation, and delivery of high-quality products to users
Design software that is simple to use to allow customers to extend and customize the functionality to meet their specific needs
Contribute to the design and implementation of new products and features while also enhancing the existing product suite
Be a mentor and coach for other engineers and help promote knowledge-sharing
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on building tools using the ServiceNow Platform, writing high-quality code, and designing software for user customization. There is no mention of training or fine-tuning large language models, which is a specialized task related to machine learning and AI. The responsibilities do not indicate involvement with domain-specific tasks or advanced techniques for language models.
